Package org.jerkar.utils

Contains Jerkar utility classes (meaning classes holding only static helper methods).

JkUtilsIO Utility class for dealing with Inputs/Outputs.
JkUtilsIO.StreamGobbler Runs a thread copying all data from a stream to a specified writer.
JkUtilsIO.StreamGobbler.InnerRunnable

Package org.jerkar.utils Description

Contains Jerkar utility classes (meaning classes holding only static helper methods). These methods are used by Jerkar itself for its automation engine and its build framework but Jerkar users can use it as well if they want to avoid dependencies on component as Jakarta commons or Guava.
